roadmapItems.title: Release v1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with core functionalities and basic features.

children.title: Core Module
children.description: Core functionalities of the library.

children.title: Implement basic data structures
children.description: Will implement basic data structures like arrays, linked lists, and stacks.

children.title: Set up project scaffolding
children.description: Will set up the initial project structure and build system.

children.title: Utility Functions
children.description: Basic utility functions for data manipulation.

children.title: Add string manipulation utilities
children.description: Will add utility functions for string manipulation.

children.title: Include date/time utilities
children.description: Will include functions to handle date and time operations.

roadmapItems.title: Release v1.1.0
roadmapItems.description: This release focuses on adding new features and improving performance.

children.title: Performance Improvements
children.description: Enhancements to improve the performance of the library.

children.title: Optimize data structure operations
children.description: Will optimize operations on existing data structures to improve performance.

children.title: Reduce memory footprint
children.description: Will implement changes to reduce the overall memory footprint of the library.

children.title: New Features
children.description: Introduction of new functionalities.

children.title: Add support for Promises
children.description: Will add support for Promise-based asynchronous operations.

children.title: Implement event handling
children.description: Will implement a basic event handling system.

roadmapItems.title: Release v1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Focus on bug fixes and small enhancements.

children.title: Bug Fixes
children.description: Fixes for various issues reported by users.

children.title: Fix issue with array sorting
children.description: Will fix an issue where array sorting does not work as expected under certain conditions.

children.title: Resolve memory leak in event handler
children.description: Will resolve a memory leak occurring in the event handling system.

children.title: Small Enhancements
children.description: Minor enhancements to improve usability.

children.title: Add additional date formats
children.description: Will add support for additional date formats in date utilities.

children.title: Improve error messages
children.description: Will enhance error messages to provide more detailed information.

roadmapItems.title: Release v2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major release introducing new modules and significant enhancements.

children.title: New Module: DOM Manipulation
children.description: Introduction of a new module for DOM manipulation.

children.title: Implement basic DOM selectors
children.description: Will implement basic DOM selectors to simplify DOM manipulation.

children.title: Add event delegation
children.description: Will add support for event delegation to improve performance and flexibility.

children.title: Improved Documentation
children.description: Enhancements to the library documentation.

children.title: Add detailed usage examples
children.description: Will add detailed usage examples for each module and function.

children.title: Improve API reference
children.description: Will improve the API reference section with more comprehensive details and examples.

roadmapItems.title: Release v2.1.0
roadmapItems.description: Minor release focusing on stability and minor feature additions.

children.title: Stability Improvements
children.description: Enhancements to improve the stability of the library.

children.title: Fix occasional crashes
children.description: Will fix issues causing occasional crashes under specific conditions.

children.title: Resolve compatibility issues with older browsers
children.description: Will resolve compatibility issues with older versions of major browsers.

children.title: Minor Feature Additions
children.description: Adding small but useful features to the library.

children.title: Add support for new date formats
children.description: Will add support for additional date formats in date utilities.

children.title: Enhance logging functionality
children.description: Will enhance the logging functionality to provide more detailed logs.
